author: nishant0
content:
<@340345049063882753> hey , I am occasionally seeing teku propagate aggregates with bad signatures on goerli:

> DEBUG sync: Gossip message was rejected agent=teku/teku/v22.8.0/linux-x86_64/-eclipseadoptium-openjdk64bitservervm-java-17 error=Verification of aggregate failed gossip score=2.8162448517379155 multiaddress=/ip4/x/tcp/x peer id=x topic=/eth2/c2ce3aa8/beacon_aggregate_and_proof/ssz_snappy
> 
> DEBUG sync: Gossip message was rejected agent=teku/teku/v22.8.0/linux-x86_64/-eclipseadoptium-openjdk64bitservervm-java-17 error=Verification of aggregate failed gossip score=0 multiaddress=/ip4/x/tcp/x peer id=x topic=/eth2/c2ce3aa8/beacon_aggregate_and_proof/ssz_snappy

Is this a known issue ? The bad aggregates come from varying peers rather than a single bad one. I dont have more data on this, but if you want I can add in custom logs to prysm to print out the failed aggregates and I can send them to you

author: ajsutton
content: No not something we know about.  We should be verifying signatures before forwarding.  If you are able to grab an example of one it would definitely help.

author: nishant0
content: sure thing, will add the debug logs in and paste what I can find here

author: nishant0
content: Its a bit late here and I haven't had time to analyze it, but can take a look tomorrow
